summary: A burned-out New York police detective teams up with a college psychoanalyst to track down a vicious serial killer randomly stalking and killing various young women around the city.
cast: Jack Hedley|Almanta Suska|Howard Ross|Andrea Occhipinti|Alexandra Delli Colli|Paolo Malco|Cinzia de Ponti|Cosimo Cinieri|Daniela Doria|Babette New|Zora Kerova|Paul E. title: El destripador de Nueva York
